Description:
In the yard in 2054. The magic returned to the world, evoking powerful creatures of myth and legend.
Mir where technology is fused with the body and mind. Elves, trolls, orcs and dwarves walk among us, while
ruthless corporation depletes the bloody world. You 'Running in the Shadows' - A mercenary, who lives on the
outskirts of the survivors, in the shadow of the massive corporate archeology. You have to look for a job at
any cost in order to survive. Overgrown In Seattle Metroplex you go in search of the mysterious assassin, traces
of which will lead you to places ranging from the dark slums and ending . You will need to carefully run, with
the support of other runners. Need to master the powerful technology and magic to escape the shadow
of the Seattle sound.
